entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4 except minus 13 inland. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 then light near midnight. Low minus 4 except minus 13 inland. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
